Name: Love You Too
Description: Enter the credits to view the very incredibly handsome sexy talented developers behind this.
RewardDescription: Unlocks the Sandbox Mode mutator, with which you have infinite resources available.
FunFact: The "Sandbox Mode" mutator works internally by replacing the default "Player" with a "Sandbox Player", which has different implementations of the various objects that govern how the players resources, inventory, and unlocks function, in this case implementations that force infinite resources and all unlocks.
